comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Steel men -- James Bowron was the founder of the steel industry in Birmingham, AL, and a city father. www.lib.ua.edu/content/findingaids/pdf/mss_0193.pdf (Short bio on page 4) Farrell was president of US Steel at this time: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_A._Farrell

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks rjones0856 for providing further information and the connection between the two men.   We'll add their full names when we update the description.  Also thanks to artolog for pointing out the date on the negative.  We'll add that information, as well!
